    • loadUCR

      public com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries loadUCR​(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String delimeter, int lineNo)
      Loads a TimeSeries from a UCR file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - A String that contains full path of the file.
      delimeter - A String that separates the values of TimeSeries.
      hasHeaderLine - A boolean that specifies if the first line should be read.
      lineNo - An int that specifies the line that should be read.
      Returns:
      A TimeSeries that contains the values from the file.

    • loadColumn

      public com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries loadColumn​(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String delimeter, boolean hasHeaderLine, int column)
      Loads a TimeSeries from a Column file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - A String that contains full path of the file.
      delimeter - A String that separates the values of TimeSeries.
      hasHeaderLine - A boolean that specifies if the first line should be read.
      lineNo - An int that specifies the column that should be read.
      Returns:
      A TimeSeries that contains the values from the file.

    • getSeasonality

      public com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries getSeasonality​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries timeSeries, int periodLength, int seasonalWidth)
      Extracts the seasonality from a TimeSeries.
      Parameters:
      timeSeries - A TimeSeries to be examined.
      periodLength - An int that shows the length of the time Period.
      seasonalWidth - An int that specifies the number of times seasonal component should appear on the result.
      Returns:
      A TimeSeries that contains the seasonal component of the input TimeSeries, as many times as specified.

      Parameters:
      timeSeries1 - A TimeSeries that is used as the first operand in subtraction.
      timeSeries2 - A TimeSeries that is used as the second operand in subtraction.
      Returns:
      A TimeSeries that is used as the result of the subtraction.

      Calculates the autocorrelations up to the given lag.
      Parameters:
      timeSeries - A TimeSeries to be measured.
      k - An int that represents the max autocorrelation value to be calculated.
      Returns:
      A double array that holds all the autocorrelations up to the given lag in order.

      Splits a TimeSeries into a training set and a test set.
      Parameters:
      timeSeries - A TimeSeries to be split.
      percentage - A double that specifies the percentage of the original TimeSeries that should be contained in training set.
      Returns:
      A TimeSeries array containing training set and test set.

    • createModelForecast

      public com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries[] createModelForecast​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.model.arima.Arima currentModel, int futureValues)
      Creates a new forecast for the given model.
      Parameters:
      currentModel - An Arima model to be examined.
      futureValues - An int that specifies how many future values should be predicted.
      Returns:
      A TimeSeries array that contains the point estimates, upper interval and lower interval of the forecast.

    • validateModel

      public boolean validateModel​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries testSet, com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries[] forecastValues)
      Validates a model by comparing test set and forecasted values.
      Parameters:
      testSet - A TimeSeries that contains the test set.
      forecastValues - A TimeSeries array that contains the point estimates, upper interval and lower interval of the forecast.
      Returns:
      A boolean value that specifies if the validation was successful.

      Parameters:
      arima - An Arima model.
      Returns:
